definition: aerial work platform (e.g. cherry picker or scissor lift)/lift/elevator

to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend

sentences.english: The electrical connection in the photoelectrics levator involves electronics.

sentences.english: Shapes, smooths, supports and lifts with perfectly placed padding and comfortable straps.
sentences.chinese: 形狀，平滑，支持和升降機最適合填充和舒適的揹帶。

sentences.english: Also available are 8 high capacity cargo lifts and 6 passenger lifts.

sentences.english: Crank-type lift is a small lifting kind.
sentences.chinese: 曲臂式升降機是小型起重機械的一種。

sentences.english: The Pinnacle can perform up to 150 lifts on a single charge.
sentences.chinese: 疊翠軒可以執行高達150升降機一次充電。

sentences.english: C: Well. How many elevators are there?
sentences.chinese: 原來如此，這裏有多少部升降機呢？

sentences.english: The miners are lowered into the mine by means of an elevator known as a cage.

sentences.english: The stomach lift massages the digestive organs, as well as contracting and stretching them.
sentences.chinese: 胃升降機按摩消化器官，以及他們承包和伸展。

sentences.english: Steam boilers of 40 m height. An elevator near every boiler.
sentences.chinese: 40米高的蒸汽鍋爐，每個蒸汽鍋爐旁邊都有升降機。

sentences.english: Scissor lift is the extensive use of special equipment for high-altitude operation.
sentences.chinese: 剪叉式升降機是用途廣泛的高空作業專用設備。

sentences.english: Relax, and give your life a lift with an Acorn Stairlift.
sentences.chinese: 放鬆，給你的生活與一個橡子座椅電梯升降機。

definition: building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
(used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
parking spot/unloading point/garage place/stand for taxi
